Sentencas: Recent advances in microstructural imaging and characterization tools have led to an increase in the direct examination of 3-D microstructures of composite materials in devices such as solid oxide fuel cells, battery electrodes, and composite gas separation membranes.
Titulo: Determining the representative volume element size for three-dimensional microstructural material characterization. Part 1: Predictive models

Sentencas: In particular, focused ion beam-scanning electron microscopy and x-ray nanotomography methods have opened the door for materials characterization at the tens of nanometer scale.
Titulo: Determining the representative volume element size for three-dimensional microstructural material characterization. Part 1: Predictive models

Sentencas: These experimental methods have enabled the quantitative evaluation of microstructures for a variety of important parameters.
Titulo: Determining the representative volume element size for three-dimensional microstructural material characterization. Part 1: Predictive models

Sentencas: However, there is often uncertainty in the literature regarding the necessary size of a representative volume element (RVE) in order to capture an accurate description of the structure.
Titulo: Determining the representative volume element size for three-dimensional microstructural material characterization. Part 1: Predictive models

Sentencas: In an effort to provide guidance for the field, in this work simplified geometric models are presented to provide basis for the a priori estimation of RVE size for three common microstructural parameters: volume fraction, particle size, and network contiguity.
Titulo: Determining the representative volume element size for three-dimensional microstructural material characterization. Part 1: Predictive models

Sentencas: In a second and complementary paper (Part 2), the results of the model will be compared to experimental data obtained from the extensive imaging of a multiphase composite membrane material using x-ray nanotomography.
Titulo: Determining the representative volume element size for three-dimensional microstructural material characterization. Part 1: Predictive models
